# Architecture Guidance

> Architecture guidance and patterns for .NET applications. Covers microservices, cloud-native development, Blazor migration from Web Forms, .NET MAUI, and modern web applications on Azure.

## Topic Indices

- [Blazor For Web Forms Developers](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/architecture/blazor-for-web-forms-developers/llms.txt): 15 topics
- [Cloud Native](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/architecture/cloud-native/llms.txt): 44 topics
- [Maui](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/architecture/maui/llms.txt): 14 topics
- [Microservices](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/architecture/microservices/llms.txt): 2 topics, 74 in tree
- [Modern Web Apps Azure](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/architecture/modern-web-apps-azure/llms.txt): 11 topics
